scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run lint:img-dimensions
scripts.build:devpreview: cross-env CHANNEL=dev npm run gen:version && vite build --mode devpreview
scripts.build:preview: cross-env CHANNEL=preview npm run gen:version && vite build --mode production
scripts.build: cross-env CHANNEL=prod npm run gen:version && vite build --mode production
scripts.build:prod: cross-env CHANNEL=prod npm run gen:version && vite build --mode production
scripts.deploy:dev:preview: npm run guard:dev && npm run build:devpreview && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview-dev --expires 7d --project dash-dev
scripts.predeploy:prod:preview: npm run guard:preview && npm run lint  && npm run check:branch:prodprep && npm run build:preview
scripts.deploy:prod:preview: npm run predeploy:prod:preview && firebase hosting:channel:deploy prod-preview --expires 7d --project dash-prod
scripts.deploy:prod:preview:force: npm run check:branch:prodprep && npm run guard:preview && npm run build:prod && firebase hosting:channel:deploy prod-preview --project dash-prod --expires 7d
scripts.predeploy:prod:live: npm run lint:strict && npm run guard:prod && npm run check:branch:main && npm run check:clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.deploy:prod:live: npm run predeploy:prod:live && firebase deploy --only hosting --project dash-prod
